website_summaries.verdict: For a silhouette from Vans that has been prominent for about 40 years, it only proves that the Old Skool can still be a relevant piece, despite being donned in varying colors and profiles. The Old Skool Platform carries the same silhouette as its predecessor.The thick rubber outsole gives an emphasis this time which proves that thicker is bolder. This slight change not only upgrades the sneaker's style game but also enhances its comfort and durability.
pros: Several of those who have purchased the Vans Old Skool Platform find the thickness of the sole perfect
The Vans Old Skool Platform is an excellent spin on the classic Old Skool, one online commenter has observed
One who has used these for skating says that it provides the right amount of balance
Compared to the Chuck Taylors, these hold up better mainly because of the thicker sole, one of the testers have said
Because of the added height, it exudes a narrower silhouette, which is preferred by a reviewer
A couple of buyers think that the platform version is better than the regular sole
Few have observed that despite the thick sole, it remains to be lightweight
One mentions that these are more comfortable than the regular Vans Old Skool
Some users highly appreciate the colorway because it doesn't show up dirt quickly
cons: One wishes that there are extra shoelaces that come with the shoe
A high number complain about the shoe falling apart for only a short period of use
Many users hope that there are more colorways available for the platform version of the Vans Old Skool

customer_reviews.title: Love these vans, thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Was a bit worried ordering off of amazon but they are great! Took a week delivery but worth it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Very comfortable and fitted well. Unfortunately I found them just a bit too bulky for me but I would still definitely recommend them. It took me a while to decide whether to keep them or not as I liked them so much but in the end just didn’t look right on me.
customer_reviews.author: Paulcol

customer_reviews.title: Gift = Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my partner, who is really happy with the shoes after we struggled to find stock elsewhere. Whilst the price at the time was a little expensive, she's barely taken them off in recent weeks. Shoes look great on, are easy to clean and don't seem to have worn quickly which is of course a positive.
customer_reviews.author: Regan Foy

customer_reviews.title: Vans Women's Old Skool Platform Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Loves these but they just look so bulky on my feet and the 6.5 size was abit to snug so I returned these. Great quality and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy81xx

customer_reviews.title: Lovely fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my significant other. Look great and fit well, take a while to wear them in but that's expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable once on. But they are tricky to get on so you have to unlace them a bit to get your foot in. Also, the laces are ridiculously too long.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase. New colour. Very well made. Durable. Classic design.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G E Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: perfect!!!! such amazing quality, brand new. and they fit like a glove, i’m a size 6 and theyre perfect
customer_reviews.author: courteney

customer_reviews.title: Trainers too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Trainers were too clumpy and heavy, seemed too big for a size 5
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: perfect if you love receiving wrong items!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the black and white pair, however when arrived I received an all black pair. Quite a waste of time. Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I've had the same pair for about 2 years now and they are my fav
customer_reviews.author: s lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Speedy delivery. Lovely shoe, comfy but slightly on ...
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery. Lovely shoe, comfy but slightly on large size.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stunning shoes 👍🏻 but the side had began to peel off within about a month :(
customer_reviews.author: Elle Foreman

customer_reviews.title: But they scuff really easily.
customer_reviews.text: Got them for a friend. She loves them. Arrived early. But they scuff really easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: Real vans
customer_reviews.text: They are real vans and they are just amazing! They hurt my feet in the first times I used them but as soon as they shaped to my feet they are incredibly comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got them for a friend they are very pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one lace
customer_reviews.text: They were good but I only had one lace sent to me so had to then replace the perfect lace with some of my own.
customer_reviews.author: rosie mooney

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Brought these shoes for my mom and she is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Aicha Yassine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing they are comfortable and can be worn both formal and casual. And fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pot of vans and I love them I only ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pot of vans and I love them I only wish there will be a speedy delivery option on this particular item. Everything else ok
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They fit prefect and arrived on time, exactly what I wanted, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Just like expected
customer_reviews.text: Came before expected, less then a week. New. Super comfortable. The platform though, is his as high as a Dr. Martens regular heel.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable ! And you can literally pair these with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

product_meta.title: Vans Women's Old Skool Platform Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Womens Old Skool Platform from Vans combines a Suede & Canvas upper with a durable Rubber sole. These Trainers feature Lace Up fastening, cushioned insole and Textile lining. Finished with Vans branding, the style VA3B3UY28 comes in a Black White colourway.
